last_episode_to_air.name: Plus Est En Vous
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rapunzel and her friends must take Corona back from Cassandra and confront the evil Zhan Tiri.

name: Rapunzel's Tangled Adventure
overview: Set between “Tangled” and “Tangled Ever After,” this animated adventure/comedy series unfolds as Rapunzel acquaints herself with her parents, her kingdom and the people of Corona.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Tangled: The Series "Short Cuts" are a mini-series from Season 1. The series is available on iTunes, DisneyNOW and YouTube.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: It’s just the beginning of happily ever after for lovers Rapunzel and Eugene Fitzherbert. As Rapunzel reacquaints herself with her parents, her kingdom and the people of the island realm Corona, she comes to realize that there is so much more she needs to learn about the outside world and herself before she becomes Princess of Corona. Eventually, Princess Rapunzel uncovers the mystery of her hair's return and its connection to the black rock spikes growing exponentially around both Old and New Corona, with the help of her handmaiden and best female friend Cassandra, and young quirky alchemist Varian.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two finds Rapunzel venturing outside of the kingdom in search of where the mystical black rocks lead, after discovering she is somehow connected to them. Accompanying Rapunzel on her journey is Eugene; Cassandra; her loyal chameleon sidekick, Pascal; no-nonsense and dutiful horse, Maximus; and the Snuggly Duckling Pub Thugs. Together, they will discover new people and places and embark on an incredible new adventure far beyond Corona's walls.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Rapunzel returns to the kingdom of Corona only to find that it has been taken over by an old enemy with the help of Andrew and the Separatists of the realm of Saporia. Still reeling from Cassandra’s betrayal and newfound Moonstone-empowered strength, the barefoot princess must use her innermost strength to save all of Corona and that of the entire world. Sticking by her side is her boyfriend and partner in life, Eugene; her loyal chameleon sidekick, Pascal; no-nonsense and dutiful stallion, Maximus; Eugene’s best childhood friend, Lance Strongbow, a redeemed Varian and two former thieves, Angry and Red's real names are revealed to be Kiera and Catalina.

episodes.name: What the Hair?!
episodes.overview: Rapunzel and Cassandra venture out to a wizard’s cottage to try and find out what has happened to her hair.

episodes.name: Rapunzel's Enemy
episodes.overview: When Rapunzel gets booed, she becomes determined to win over her naysayer, a little old man who is loved by everyone in the kingdom.

episodes.name: Fitzherbert P.I.
episodes.overview: Eugene sets out to find a role for himself in the castle and decides to be a royal guard, but to pass muster, he must overcome the Captain's preconceptions.

episodes.name: Challenge of the Brave
episodes.overview: When Cassandra enters the Challenge of the Brave, Rapunzel decides to enter the challenge as well causing both girls’ competitive nature to come out!

episodes.name: Cassandra v. Eugene
episodes.overview: Rapunzel is sick of the constant bickering between Cassandra and Eugene, so she sends them off on a scavenger hunt as a bonding experience.

episodes.name: The Return of Strongbow
episodes.overview: When Eugene‘s old friend Lance Strongbow sweeps back into town, he tries to drag Eugene back into his thieving ways.

episodes.name: In Like Flynn
episodes.overview: In order to prank a rival monarch, King Frederic recruits Eugene to help pull off a scheme.

episodes.name: Great Expotations
episodes.overview: Cassandra is given the chance to be a guard for the Judge of the Exposition of the Sciences, but only if she can complete her handmaiden duties in time.

episodes.name: Under Raps
episodes.overview: Rapunzel discovers that Cassandra has a new crush, but could Cassandra's new beau be interested in more than Cassandra's heart?

episodes.name: One Angry Princess
episodes.overview: When Attila is accused of destroying Monty's Sweet Shoppe, Rapunzel's the only one who believes the Pub Thug's cries of innocence.

episodes.name: Pascal's Story
episodes.overview: When Pascal begins to feel that he doesn't fit into Rapunzel's new life in the castle, he runs away and returns to the tower.

episodes.name: Big Brothers of Corona
episodes.overview: When an infamous thief turns out to be two orphaned little girls, Eugene and Lance try to turn the girls away from their life of crime.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Ruthless Ruth
episodes.overview: When The Snuggly Duckling suddenly becomes haunted by its original owner, Ruthless Ruth, Rapunzel helps the Pub Thugs figure out the reason behind the ghost’s return.

episodes.name: Max's Enemy
episodes.overview: When a new crime-fighting horse arrives in Corona, it doesn’t take long for Maximus to realize his new stablemate didn’t come to town to make nice.

episodes.name: The Way of the Willow
episodes.overview: When Rapunzel discovers that Queen Arianna has an estranged sister, she invites her newly discovered Aunt Willow to Corona.

episodes.name: Queen for a Day
episodes.overview: When the King and Queen leave town, Rapunzel is set to lead. However, when a blizzard threatens to destroy Corona, the Princess is faced with some tough decisions.

episodes.name: Painter's Block
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the blizzard, Rapunzel's confidence is shaken. In an effort to get her "mojo" back, she rededicates herself to painting, and enrolls in an art class.

episodes.name: Not in the Mood
episodes.overview: Fed up with the constant bickering, Max and Pascal give Rapunzel, Cass and Eugene an attitude reversing potion.

episodes.name: The Quest for Varian
episodes.overview: When Rapunzel investigates a cryptic message from Varian, she finds herself on the run from a group of masked men.

episodes.name: The Alchemist Returns
episodes.overview: Rapunzel agrees to help Varian recover the sundrop flower, but the princess learns the young alchemist has shadier intentions than he had first suggested.

episodes.name: Secret of the Sun Drop
episodes.overview: Rapunzel must face her greatest threat yet, when Varian, desperate to save his father, takes the Queen prisoner.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: It’s just the beginning of happily ever after for lovers Rapunzel and Eugene Fitzherbert. As Rapunzel reacquaints herself with her parents, her kingdom and the people of the island realm Corona, she comes to realize that there is so much more she needs to learn about the outside world and herself before she becomes Princess of Corona. Eventually, Princess Rapunzel uncovers the mystery of her hair's return and its connection to the black rock spikes growing exponentially around both Old and New Corona, with the help of her handmaiden and best female friend Cassandra, and young quirky alchemist Varian.

episodes.name: Beyond the Corona Walls
episodes.overview: Finally outside the kingdom's walls, Rapunzel begins her long journey following the path of the black rocks.

episodes.name: The Return of Quaid
episodes.overview: When a new crime boss tries to rise to power in Vardaros, Rapunzel attempts to persuade an old lawman out of retirement to help save the day.

episodes.name: Goodbye and Goodwill
episodes.overview: Rapunzel plans to bring the Goodwill Festival to Vardaros, but when the locals respond more favorably to Cassandra’s ideas, Rapunzel becomes competitive.

episodes.name: Forest of No Return
episodes.overview: When the gang gets lost in the mysterious Forest of No Return, they must rely on the mysterious Adira as their guide.

episodes.name: Freebird
episodes.overview: Rapunzel’s adventurous spirit leads the gang to a hidden corner of the woods where everyone is magically transformed into birds.

episodes.name: Vigor the Visionary
episodes.overview: When Rapunzel and Eugene visit a psychic monkey, his visions lead them on an adventure to find the family of their old friend and young thief, Angry.

episodes.name: Keeper of the Spire
episodes.overview: To acquire a piece of the scroll, Rapunzel travels to an ancient museum at the top of an impossibly tall spire with the museum’s incredibly arrogant curator.

episodes.name: King Pascal
episodes.overview: Tiny islanders the Lorbs mistake Pascal for their mystical ruler; the chameleon loves the adulation, until he's expected to protect his people from a vicious monster.

episodes.name: There's Something About Hook Foot
episodes.overview: Hook Foot falls in love with a mermaid with ulterior motives.

episodes.name: Happiness Is...
episodes.overview: A homesick Rapunzel discovers a mysterious idol with the power to bring instant happiness to whomever holds it, but its power threatens to tear the group apart.

episodes.name: Max and Eugene in 'Peril on the High Seas'
episodes.overview: When Max and Eugene are stranded at sea they are saved by a passing ship only to discover that it is not what they expected.

episodes.name: Curses!
episodes.overview: Rapunzel again encounters Madame Zabrina and Vigor the Visionary. Vigor puts a curse on Rapunzel just before she and her friends cross a perilous mountain pass.

episodes.name: The Eye of Pincosta
episodes.overview: To bail Eugene out of jail, Rapunzel must team up with Stalyan, Eugene's ex-fiancée, to find a diamond the two thieves had stolen years ago.

episodes.name: Rapunzeltopia
episodes.overview: Rapunzel finds herself back in Corona as if all the events of the black rocks and Varian never happened.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Rapunzel and Eugene must traverse a deadly maze, and their guide through the labyrinth is Vigor the Visionary.

episodes.name: Destinies Collide
episodes.overview: Rapunzel follows the black rocks to the Dark Kingdom to uncover the truth behind her destiny.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two finds Rapunzel venturing outside of the kingdom in search of where the mystical black rocks lead, after discovering she is somehow connected to them. Accompanying Rapunzel on her journey is Eugene; Cassandra; her loyal chameleon sidekick, Pascal; no-nonsense and dutiful horse, Maximus; and the Snuggly Duckling Pub Thugs. Together, they will discover new people and places and embark on an incredible new adventure far beyond Corona's walls.

episodes.name: Rapunzel's Return
episodes.overview: After learning the reason behind Cassandra’s betrayal, Rapunzel returns to Corona only to find it taken over by one of her most dangerous enemies.

episodes.name: Return of the King
episodes.overview: King Edmund arrives in Corona to give his son, Eugene, a family heirloom. When the heirloom is stolen, Eugene reluctantly joins his dad on a journey to retrieve it.

episodes.name: Who's Afraid of the Big, Bad Wolf?
episodes.overview: Rapunzel and Eugene's friends Angry and Red return to Corona permanently and their return quickly becomes a nightmare when the kingdom is stalked by a werewolf.

episodes.name: The Lost Treasure of Herz Der Sonne
episodes.overview: After discovering a map to a mythical treasure, Rapunzel believes that holding a race to claim it will be just the pick-me-up the people of Corona need.

episodes.name: No Time Like the Past
episodes.overview: An ancient hourglass sends Rapunzel and Pascal back in time, and their only hope of returning to the present is in the hands of a teenage Lance and Eugene.

episodes.name: Beginnings
episodes.overview: As Rapunzel struggles with Cassandra’s betrayal, the princess recounts the story of how she and Cassandra first became friends.

episodes.name: The King and Queen of Hearts
episodes.overview: Rapunzel finds that her parents' memory loss has made them forget how they fell in love; things get complicated when King Trevor tries to steal the Queen's heart.

episodes.name: Day of the Animals
episodes.overview: Max, Pascal and the animals must rescue Rapunzel and the gang from being trapped forever in a magical prison.

episodes.name: Be Very Afraid
episodes.overview: When Corona is overcome by a new strain of rocks that induces fearful visions, Rapunzel teams up with Varian to put an end to the new threat

episodes.name: Pascal's Dragon
episodes.overview: Pascal befriends a baby dragon but as the dragon grows, Pascal has to choose between his new friend and the safety of Corona.

episodes.name: Islands Apart
episodes.overview: After receiving a message from Owl, Rapunzel and Eugene travel back to the island of the Lorbs, where they reconnect with the Captain of the Guard.

episodes.name: Cassandra's Revenge
episodes.overview: When Rapunzel feels ready to settle down and begin living a normal life, Cassandra returns to Corona with a score to settle.

episodes.name: Plus Est En Vous
episodes.overview: Rapunzel and her friends must take Corona back from Cassandra and confront the evil Zhan Tiri.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Rapunzel returns to the kingdom of Corona only to find that it has been taken over by an old enemy with the help of Andrew and the Separatists of the realm of Saporia. Still reeling from Cassandra’s betrayal and newfound Moonstone-empowered strength, the barefoot princess must use her innermost strength to save all of Corona and that of the entire world. Sticking by her side is her boyfriend and partner in life, Eugene; her loyal chameleon sidekick, Pascal; no-nonsense and dutiful stallion, Maximus; Eugene’s best childhood friend, Lance Strongbow, a redeemed Varian and two former thieves, Angry and Red's real names are revealed to be Kiera and Catalina.
